rukus.text: laqad nasarakumu l-lahu fi mawatina kathiratin wayawma hunaynin idh aʿjabatkum kathratukum falam tugh'ni ʿankum shayan wadaqat ʿalaykumu l-ardu bima rahubat thumma wallaytum mud'birina
thumma anzala l-lahu sakinatahu ʿala rasulihi waʿala l-mu'minina wa-anzala junudan lam tarawha waʿadhaba alladhina kafaru wadhalika jazau l-kafirina
thumma yatubu l-lahu min baʿdi dhalika ʿala man yashau wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama l-mush'rikuna najasun fala yaqrabu l-masjida l-harama baʿda ʿamihim hadha wa-in khif'tum ʿaylatan fasawfa yugh'nikumu l-lahu min fadlihi in shaa inna l-laha ʿalimun hakimun

qatilu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi l-akhiri wala yuharrimuna ma harrama l-lahu warasuluhu wala yadinuna dina l-haqi mina alladhina utu l-kitaba hatta yuʿ'tu l-jiz'yata ʿan yadin wahum saghiruna
